Reviews.Title: Samsung B2100
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: This phone meets my needs. I work outside and want a basic phone. I bought the phone open and direct so I don't have to renw my contract to get it. I don't want to pay for a data plan. I don't text much and my texts are short so I don't mind not having a full keyboard. It is not the phone for everyone. It suits me: It is durable, goes a long time between charges, and has enough features for me, I hope it will serve me for a long time.

Reviews.Title: So far so Good
Reviews.Author: M in WA
Reviews.Content: Nearly a year now and its in great shape.  Was a European model so initial set up was quirky.All necessary parts included.

Reviews.Title: Couldn't Transmit
Reviews.Author: Patricia Heyano
Reviews.Content: The phone was for my better half and no one could hear him good on the phone.  We had to return it and opted to replace it with a different brand.

Reviews.Title: Samsung B2100EUBLK quad-band phone
Reviews.Author: 3goddess
Reviews.Content: Tough little candy bar style phone.  Very rugged - got for my husband who is a science teacher and "eats" phones like candy - have had this for months and it is good as new.  If you text a lot, then this is not for you as there is no board, just front facing numbers.  Great little phone.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Claud Craig
Reviews.Content: Good phone for the price. The phone was listed as a Euro model, but the owners manual was printed in Russian. Had to figure out features, but not so hard. Kinda small

Reviews.Title: can be dagerous.
Reviews.Author: hayu
Reviews.Content: The phone over heated in my pocket. I don't know if it over heat and burn you.Now it has static and I have tried to reboot it more and more. I can't return it !.recieved as a gift so no receipt, don.t have the box 3.The seller won't fix  it unless you get it and send it back new and you have to pay for the shipping both ways.

Reviews.Title: excellent and rugged ; for calls only
Reviews.Author: M. Domingo
Reviews.Content: if you need a phone just for calls, this one seems rugged and is easy to use and set up. the flashlight is also a surprising side benefit, bright enough to light up one's pathway through the dark. I use this with google voice so I can get my calls away from my pc.

Reviews.Title: Nice product,
Reviews.Author: Fortunada Abate
Reviews.Content: Everything wet perfect with this celphone, it's really durable i've already testet it on crashed and water and it's perfect (Excepto for some minor scratches). I'de recomend this phone to everyone who wants an a simple & durable phone. The only incovenient was that it didn't came with a normal charger for my country (Venezuela), apart of that it's perfect.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: Nancy Castro
Reviews.Content: excellent phone. is very complete. really worth to buy it because the price is affordable and the quality is unsurpassed.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone
Reviews.Author: anatoliypo
Reviews.Content: It is simple, but very nice phone.I work outside (sider), and I've bean using it for three weeks so far, and I liked it.  I would buy it again...
